We don’t slip into trance in dramatic ways. It happens softly, mid-sentence, mid-scroll, mid- turn. The issue isn’t entering them, but staying unaware of them. Once recognized, everyday trances become easier to manage, interrupt, or even use creatively rather than letting them quietly run the show.
